author: Opinion by Charles A. Kupchan
title: Trump's Covid-19 lapse gives China an opening
description: Charles A. Kupchan writes that Donald Trump's bumbling Covid-19 response is pushing Europe toward China at the same time that the United States is pushing Europeans away from its close partnership with America.
content: Charles A. Kupchan is Professor of International Affairs at Georgetown University and Senior Fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations. He served in the Obama administration as Special Assistant to the President on the National Security Council from 2014-201… [+5892 chars]
